phrases: It is the battle part of day four of the Grand Magic Games!
Due to the disqualification of Raven Tail,
Fairy Tail's A and B teams have merged and are now in a tag team battle!
It is a dream showdown between four Dragon Slayers!
Who will win, Fairy or Tiger?!
The Twin Dragons of Fiore's strongest guild are on the ropes!
But I would be disappointed otherwise.
Did you two really defeat dragons with power like that?
I killed a dragon with this very hand.
It is got nothing to do with you.
From now, I am going to show you the power that killed a dragon!
Sting and Rogue, the Twin Dragons of Sabertooth...
Dragon Slayers, like Natsu and Gajeel...
But their magic is still an unknown...
Well, let us see what happens...
I think they are done testing each other.
From here on in, they are going to get serious, so let us really cheer them on!
Which side will make the first move?!
Fairy Tail's Natsu held it back!
It looks like Fairy Tail's Gajeel is at the mercy of Rogue's Shadow Drive!
You cannot get ahold of shadows.
Do not get in my way!
Squabbling in the middle of a match?!
Is that a kind of Dragon Slayer Magic?
You have gotten faster for some reason...
It is a magic amplification technique.
On top of that, their combination skills are seamless.
This is not as thrilling as I thought it would be.
Compared to those two, it seems Fairy Tail's duo are not in sync with each other.
You are in your assured victory pattern!
The tone of the crowd's cheering has changed.
There is no need to be so anxious.
I admired you for the longest time!
And then I set my sights on surpassing you!
There is something different about it compared to previous attacks.
And what the hell is that?!
It looks like a Magic Circle...
The Claw of the White Dragon is a holy attack.
A body that is marked by its stigmata loses its freedom.
And with this, I will surpass you!
The dragon that becomes shadow hides its form.
It always takes down its prey!
Even though before, he was not even able to land a hit!
After fighting for a while, Gajeel gets used to it.
Natsu can do the same thing with ease!
But you have got a ways to go.
Only the Salamander could do that...
Do not get too stuck on yourselves, brats.
And do not make light of Fairy Tail!
The course of the battle has just shifted again!
You guys really are the best.
We have to give this our all and then some.
The Fist of the White Dragon even reduces flames to smithereens.
Sting-kun is concentrating his magic into a single point.
He stopped that tremendous attack with one hand!
I have no memory of that skill ever being blocked.
Now it makes sense why he would storm into our inn on his own.
I wonder what I could have seen if I had not stopped him then...
Yajima-san, what do you make of this?!
So three months of training and Second Origin
made these two this strong, eh?
They belong to totally different ranks.
Even I can pick up on it.
The way they are cheering has changed again, right?
Natsu and Gajeel will win, will not they?
Wh-Who could have foreseen this development?!
The Twin Dragons of Sabertooth, helpless before Fairy Tail!
Will the match end like this?!
I knew this was not going to be an easy wall to get over...
I am not going to lose.
What the hell is this magic?!
Tremble at the true power of the Third Generation.
They can activate it with their own will?!
Natsu kind of looked like that at the Tower of Heaven...
And that time with Zero too, he unleashed that power by eating all of my magic.
But they are able to release the power of the Dragon by willing it?!
This is the Third Generation of Dragon Slayers.
I can take both of them on by myself.
YOU-Until just a minute ago, Sabertooth was being dominated!
Unbelievably, he is challenged both of them!
That is how much confidence he has, huh?
Sting-kun and Rogue-kun have Dragon Force.
There is no way they can lose!
Fro forgot about Dragon Force, too!
I have not seen it yet, but is it really all that?
At this rate, the odds are against them.
No, you do not have to.
I am sure Natsu and Gajeel will be fine.
They are lookin' down on us...
Holy Breath of the White Dragon!
We can feel the magic at this distance?!
That is because it is a battle between Dragon Slayers.
The cost is going to be heavy.
The floor of the arena is...
Is this the power of the Third Generation Dragon Slayers?!
It seems the battlefield is moving underneath the arena,
Everyone, please enjoy it on Lacrima-Vision!
Sword Horn of the Fire Dragon!
The light of the White Dragon purifies all things...
What happened to that confident mood from just before?!
Lector... I made you a promise...
I told them you beat a dragon, Sting-kun!
I am not lying about it!
They were saying bad things about you, Sting-kun!
I hate it when people say bad things about my friend!
Then I will prove you are not a liar.
There may not be any more dragons, but there is somebody called Salamander, right?
One day, I will beat him, right in front of everybody.
Could those tremors from before mean...?
I mean, it is those two...
The span of seven years has allowed us to develop into true Dragon Slayers.
The time of the old generation is over.
It is been a breathless seesaw battle,
but has Fairy Tail finally run out of steam?!
Even Natsu and Gajeel cannot beat them?!
Damn, this sticks in my craw...
You can hear our voices, cannot you?!
Sorry I took Gajeel-san down, too.
No matter how many times they fall, they always get up again.
I do not know if that should be called tough or stubborn...
I knew they could do it!
We would be in a bind if they were not.
You are better than I thought.
Incredibly, they are alive and kicking!
But I saw through all of your habits.
Even the rhythm of your breathing...
Yeah, and it packs a wallop!
My body aches all over, dammit!
You really think the Salamander can pull off a trick that requires usin' his brain?!
For example, when you attack, your pivot foot is facing 11:00.
I could let you slide with 10:30, but not 11:00!
What are those two fools doing?!
They have got energy to spare.
And that means they have still got fight left in them.
Arguing at a time like this...
Yeesh, they make me want to crawl in a hole...
Oh, do not be like that.
You and Natsu are two of a kind.
When you look at me objectively, that is what you see?
I have totally got to pay you back for lookin' down on us.
I can take both of you on by myself.
Go ahead, attack me at the same time!
Now Natsu Dragneel of Fairy Tail
is challenging the two of them to a battle!
You will pay for this, Salamander!
You would never betray me, would you?
I thought this was about the match...
Natsu, you would never do anything to make me sad, right?!
I would not let anybody make you sad, Happy!
Next time: Natsu vs. the Twin Dragons!
I-I did not know it was yours, Happy!
